Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Deemos transforms and runs up. He climbs into the ship. Arrow is smiling a =
gap toothed grin. He suddenly spins around and starts firing rapidly at eve=
ry vehicle parked in the lot with a gattling gun. He spins around, causing =
several ruined vehicles and 2 explosions. A fuel leaks from about 98 percen=
t of the vehicles fired upon. Arrow pulls a flamethrower from nowhere and f=
ires, setting the entire place ablaze. Arrow, smiling evilly, finally walke=
d up and climbed into the ship...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: R=
oboRick007
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002 2=
:30 PM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  : : Diesel : :

  After his blade=
 cuts through several more Maximals, Diesel makes his way onto the ship. Lu=
cky for then it had no Maximals on board.

  Diesel poked his head back out=
.

  Diesel: Arrow, Deemos, you guys coming?!
    ----- Original Message --=
--- 
    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thurs=
day, August 15, 2002 11:55 AM
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


          =
                                                                           =
                                   : : Sting : :

                         =
                  Sting whips out a black energon baseball-bat like weapon.=
  He smacks a Maximal across the head, actually knocking the head off.

   =
                                                                           =
               Sting:  Let's get the hell out of here!

                   =
                             He makes sure no Maximals can see him, and the=
n he sneaks his way onto the ship, and waits for the others.
      ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
      From: RoboRick007 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
      Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002 12:19 AM
      Subject: Re: Sec=
ret Messages


      : : Diesel : :

      He points a ship out in the dist=
ance.

      Diesel: I suggest that one. It's a military ship. Shields, wea=
pons, everything we'll need. The others all seem to be science ships.

    =
  Diesel pulled is sword from subspace. It began to glow a crimson red and =
energy was emitted from it. Diesel was revealed as one of the few "laser ro=
d" fighters.

      Diesel: Let's go!

      He runs at the shuttle he had =
pointed out.

      Diesel does not get far before about twenty Maximals ap=
pear, all with plasma weapons. Diesel dives behind a science ship as plasma=
 charges strike his former position.

      The Maximals wait for smoke to =
clear, unsure if they had taken down their target. They hadn't. Diesel leap=
s at them his blade glowing, and slashes. Two Maximals bodies fall limp, th=
eir decapitated heads rolling at Diesel's feet.

      Diesel: You guys wan=
na get involved here or what?

      He is brought back to battle as two mo=
re shots bounce off his blade.

      Diesel: The hell with this!

      Fr=
om Diesel's shoulders come two rockets, which hit a hanger, causeing it to =
collaps on a group of Maximals standing outfront it...
        ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
        From: LurkerAbyss 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 11:05 PM
        Subject: Re=
: Secret Messages


                                                       =
                                                                    : : Sti=
ng : :

                                                                   =
             Sting drives in and comes to a halt next to Diesel.  He transf=
orms to robot mode.

                                                      =
                                        Sting:  They're all quite nice.  Wh=
at do you guys think?
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          Fro=
m: RoboRick007 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Wedne=
sday, August 14, 2002 10:32 PM
          Subject: Re: Secret Messages


   =
       : : Diesel : :

          Diesel pulled up alongside Arrow and trans=
formed to his robot mode.

          Diesel: Ok, pick a ship, and lets get =
to the killing!
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From:=
 Hollywood Narrator 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Se=
nt: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 9:17 PM
            Subject: Re: Secret Mess=
ages


            Deemos follows Diesel. Arrow speeds up to a parking lot.=
 He transforms to robot mode.

            Arrow: This is my grand opportun=
ity. I made an explosive exit last time...

              ----- Original Me=
ssage -----
              From: LurkerAbyss
              To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com
              Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 8:17 PM
          =
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                        =
                                                                           =
             : : Sting : :

                                               =
                                                               Sting:  Alri=
ght, let's head out.

                                                     =
              He transforms into a scorpion vehicle.  Basically, a scorpion=
 on wheels.  He follows Diesel and company.
                ----- Original =
Message ----- 
                From: RoboRick007 
                To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 2:10 PM=

                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                : : Diesel =
: :

                Diesel: Great, glad to have you with us.

            =
    He transformes back to truck mode.

                Diesel: Lets contin=
ue on our way!

                He continues to drive on.
                 =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: LurkerAbyss 
       =
           To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Sent: Wednesday, A=
ugust 14, 2002 1:47 PM
                  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


   =
                                                                           =
                                                     : : Sting : :

       =
                                                                           =
                        Sting smiles, and nods, acknowledging the offer.

 =
                                                                           =
                              Sting:  It would be a pleasure to aid you all=
.
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    Fro=
m: RoboRick007 
                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
           =
         Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:43 AM
                    Subj=
ect: Re: Secret Messages


                    : : Diesel : :

            =
        Diesel takes Sting's hand and shakes it. Diesel had excepted Sting,=
 he was not a enemie.

                    Diesel: I have a proposition for=
 you, Sting. We are on our way to Earth, of the past, through the Transwarp=
 rift. We plan to build a great army. Would you like to join us?

         =
           Diesel waited for a reply.
                      ----- Original =
Message ----- 
                      From: LurkerAbyss 
                   =
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                      Sent: Wednesday, Augus=
t 14, 2002 12:06 AM
                      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  =
                                                                           =
                                                         : : Sting : :

   =
                                                                           =
                                    Sting nods and then smiles a bit.
     =
                     
                                                     =
                                                        Sting:  It's a plea=
sure to meet you all.

                                                    =
                                           He extends his arm and hand out =
to Diesel, for a handshake.
                        ----- Original Message =
----- 
                        From: RoboRick007 
                        T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                        Sent: Tuesday, August 13=
, 2002 11:58 PM
                        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


    =
                    : : Diesel : :

                        Diesel transfor=
ms to his robot mode.

                        Diesel: I am Diesel.

      =
                  He motions to the others.

                        Diesel=
: This is Arrow and Deemos.
                          ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
                          From: LurkerAbyss 
                     =
     To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                          Sent: Tuesday, A=
ugust 13, 2002 11:55 PM
                          Subject: Re: Secret Messa=
ges


                                                                     =
                                                              : : Sting : :=


                                                                         =
                                    He walks closer, and gets ready to spea=
k.

                                                                       =
                                        Sting:  Hi.  It's Sting.  Who are y=
ou?
                            ----- Original Message ----- 
             =
               From: RoboRick007 
                            To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com 
                            Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 1=
0:53 PM
                            Subject: Re: Secret Messages


        =
                    : : Diesel : :

                            The dark ta=
nker sees as this mysterious bot, Sting, drops down infront of their convoy=
. He activates his breaks screeching to a stop.

                          =
  Diesel: Who are you, and what do you want?
                              =
----- Original Message ----- 
                              From: LurkerAby=
ss 
                              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
             =
                 Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:42 PM
                  =
            Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                =
                                         : : Sting : :

                   =
                               A mysterious, dark bot just happens to be de=
cending from the sky, up ahead, and lands right in the path of Diesel, Arro=
w and Deemos.  He waits to see if they will see him and stop...
           =
                     ----- Original Message ----- 
                        =
        From: RoboRick007 
                                To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
                                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 =
10:31 PM
                                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


   =
                             : : Diesel : :

                              =
  Diesel pulls out, following the others towards their destination.
       =
                         ----- Original Message ----- 
                    =
            From: Hollywood Narrator 
                                To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                                Sent: Tuesday, Augus=
t 13, 2002 9:47 PM
                                Subject: Re: Secret Mess=
ages


                                Arrow transforms into a motorcycle. =
He whips around on a dime and speeds towards the destination. Deems transfo=
rms into a mechanical vulture and flies along behind...

                  =
              ----- Original Message -----
                                =
From: RoboRick007
                                To: nbwrpg@...=
m
                                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 2:29 PM
  =
                              Subject: Re: Secret Messages


              =
                  : : Diesel : :

                                He smiled=
 at his friends excitment.

                                Diesel: Alright=
 lets go get our ship. And maybe, just maybe, we get to kill some bots doin=
g it!

                                Diesel transformes to his fuel truck=
 mode.

                                Diesel: Roll out!

                =
                He drives out and pulls to the side waiting for Arrow to le=
ad the way.
